data.actual_result: The instant invite is marked as expired and the box says that the max server limit has been hit.
data.expected_result: You should be taken to the channel you've created instant invite for.
data.short_description: Instant invite show that max server limit is reached even if we try to join a server we're in.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join 100 servers - Create instant invite of one of the servers you're in. - Join the server with the instant invite you've created.
